problem.title: Valid Palindrome
problem.description: A phrase is a palindrome if, after converting all uppercase letters into lowercase letters and removing all non-alphanumeric characters, it reads the same forward and backward.

solutions.title: Solution 1 – Two Pointers
solutions.description: Use two pointers to compare characters from both ends.
